name: Galaxian (itch)
description:
This is a clone of the classic Galaxian game from the 70's by NAMCO.

If you're new to this game i think you'll find it very interesting
to play and maybe more!...but if you already knew this game you will
notice this clone gives you the sensation of playing the original game
but of course with some minor differences.

Nothing more to say just enjoy!.
